response.answer_text: Hello greetings, New technologies have come as a intervention in this modern period. It is often said that visualization of any thing has been a successful attempt to memorizing things hence in most of the schools primary children are often taught through projector rather than making bore them by reading theories. Also in many of the places, robotics are arranged so that students may understand the importance of artificial intelligence. Not only this but also, mobile has been the best friend of toppers. So we can guess that what will happen after further 10years. Due to these advancing technologies somewhere we are going farther than our customs and spirituality that is equally important. Hence Inspite of being cultivated by recent technology changes, we are still in danger. I am sure that whoever reading this post will learn the aspects and use of technologies. Hence don't be cyanical about technology because it can have both the outcomes good as well as bad. Two year ago we are confined to finger unlock not on the screen but on back of the phone, but now we have seen and tried the finger screen unlock. So in these couple of months how much advancement have come in technology so we can guess that after couple of years we will be living in the era of robots, artificial intelligence and technologies. response.answer_text: Machine learning focuses on the development of computer programs that can access data and use it learn for themselves. The primary aim is to allow the computers learn automatically without human intervention or assistance and adjust actions accordingly. Let us look at some ways in which machine learning will improve education in India. One way machine learning will improve education is by grouping students and teachers according to their needs and availability. This can be achieved by creating virtual classrooms and labs.
